name: AR 4 In A Row
description: With augmented reality, you can play the classic 4 in a row game within the real world. Whether on a coffee table or a kitchen table, on the beach or in bed. You can play anywhere your phone detects a surface. Try to beat the computer or play against a friend. 4 levels of gameplay (easy, medium, hard and expert) lets you keep having fun as you improve your game.
